entry.tran: (常指有意提供的)假消息，错误消息
entry.def: Misinformation is wrong information which is given to someone, often in a deliberate attempt to make them believe something which is not true.

example.ex: This was a deliberate piece of misinformation.
example.tran: 这是一条故意制造的假消息。
